scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const workletsDir = path.join(__dirname, 'node_modules', 'react-native-worklets'); if (!fs.existsSync(workletsDir)) { fs.mkdirSync(workletsDir, { recursive: true }); fs.writeFileSync(path.join(workletsDir, 'package.json'), JSON.stringify({ name: 'react-native-worklets', version: '1.0.0', main: '../react-native-worklets-core/lib/commonjs/index', plugin: '../react-native-worklets-core/plugin.js' }, null, 2)); fs.symlinkSync(path.join(__dirname, 'node_modules', 'react-native-worklets-core', 'plugin.js'), path.join(workletsDir, 'plugin.js'), 'file'); }"
